name: Capsakid
flavorText: The more sunlight this Pokémon bathes in, the more spicy chemicals are produced by its body, and thus the spicier its moves become.

previous.name: Klawf
previous.flavorText: Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.

next.name: Scovillain
next.flavorText: The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.
